trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ResolveName"></xref> event of a serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden som behandler den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager.ResolveName"> </xref> hendelse til en overordnet for serialisering.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager> to resolve object names during serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Denne representanten brukes av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>å løse objektnavn under serialisering og deserialisering.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager>

trans-unit.source: When you create a ResolveNameEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en ResolveNameEventHandler representant, må du identifisere metoden som håndterer hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte hendelsen til hendelsesbehandlingen, må du legge til en forekomst av representanten i hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen kalles når det oppstår hendelsen, med mindre du fjerner representanten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hendelsesbehandlingen representanter [NIB: hendelser og representanter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
